name: Organic Cotton T-Shirt
description: A classic, comfortable t-shirt made from 100% GOTS-certified organic cotton. Soft, breathable, and sustainably produced with a minimal water footprint.

images.alt: Front view of an organic cotton t-shirt
Back view of an organic cotton t-shirt

eco_credentials.details: Produced in a factory powered by renewable energy with a minimal water footprint.

name: Recycled Glass Water Bottle
description: Durable and stylish water bottle made from 100% recycled glass. Features a leak-proof, sustainably sourced bamboo lid and a protective silicone sleeve. Free of BPA, BPS, and phthalates.

images.alt: Recycled glass water bottle with a bamboo lid
Close-up of the bottle's bamboo lid

eco_credentials.material: Bottle from 100% post-consumer recycled glass; lid from sustainably sourced bamboo
eco_credentials.details: Manufactured ethically using renewable energy sources.

name: Bamboo Reusable Utensil Set
description: An essential on-the-go kit for a zero-waste lifestyle. Includes a fork, spoon, knife, and chopsticks in a convenient GOTS-certified organic cotton pouch. All items are biodegradable.

images.alt: Set of reusable bamboo utensils in a fabric pouch
Set of reusable bamboo utensils in a fabric pouch

eco_credentials.material: Sustainably harvested Moso bamboo and organic cotton
eco_credentials.packaging: Completely plastic-free, recycled, and compostable packaging
eco_credentials.details: Handcrafted by artisans in a cruelty-free environment.

name: Soy Wax Scented Candle
description: Hand-poured candle made with 100% natural soy wax, a lead-free cotton wick, and essential oils. Burns cleaner and longer than traditional paraffin candles. Packaged in a reusable glass jar.

images.alt: Soy wax candle in a reusable glass jar

eco_credentials.material: 100% natural soy wax and essential oils
eco_credentials.packaging: Reusable glass jar with a recyclable kraft paper label
eco_credentials.details: Poured in small batches in a local studio to minimize carbon footprint.

name: Upcycled Denim Tote Bag
description: Unique tote bag created from discarded denim jeans. Each bag is one-of-a-kind and features a durable design with internal pockets. Supports the zero-waste fashion movement.

images.alt: Tote bag made from upcycled denim

eco_credentials.packaging: Shipped in a 100% recycled paper mailer
eco_credentials.details: Hand-sewn locally, diverting textile waste from landfills.

name: Compostable Phone Case
description: Protective and eco-friendly phone case made from a 100% compostable, plant-based material. Breaks down completely without leaving any toxic residue. Compatible with various phone models.

images.alt: Compostable phone case in a neutral color

certifications: TÃœV AUSTRIA OK compost HOME Certified
eco_credentials.details: Designed to completely break down in a home composting environment.

name: Reusable Coffee Cup (Bamboo Fiber)
description: Lightweight and durable reusable cup made primarily from bamboo fiber. Includes a resealable, BPA-free lid and a heat-protective silicone grip. Perfect for a morning commute.

images.alt: Reusable coffee cup made from bamboo fiber

eco_credentials.material: Natural bamboo fiber and food-grade silicone
eco_credentials.details: A portion of every sale goes to a reforestation program.

name: Solid Shampoo Bar
description: Zero-waste alternative to bottled shampoo. Made with natural, vegan ingredients. Lathers beautifully and leaves hair clean and soft. Lasts longer than liquid shampoo.

eco_credentials.packaging: Wrapped in a 100% compostable paper label
eco_credentials.details: Handmade in small batches, free from sulfates and parabens.

name: Recycled Paper Notebook
description: High-quality notebook with unbleached, 100% recycled paper pages. The cover is made from recycled materials and printed with soy-based inks. Perfect for writing or sketching.

images.alt: Recycled paper notebook with a minimalist design

name: Biodegradable Dog Waste Bags
description: Strong, leak-proof bags made from plant-based, biodegradable material. Unscented and planet-friendly. Comes in a roll that fits standard dispensers.

images.alt: Roll of biodegradable dog waste bags

eco_credentials.details: Breaks down in a commercial composting facility.

name: Bamboo Toothbrush
description: Ergonomic toothbrush with a handle made from sustainably harvested bamboo. Features soft, plant-based bristles for effective cleaning. A great plastic-free alternative.

images.alt: Bamboo toothbrush with a natural handle

eco_credentials.material: Sustainably sourced bamboo and plant-based bristles
eco_credentials.details: Handle is home compostable. Bristles should be removed before composting.

name: Recycled Plastic Picnic Blanket
description: Large, durable blanket made from 100% post-consumer recycled plastic bottles. Water-resistant and easy to clean. Rolls up for convenient carrying with a canvas strap.

images.alt: Recycled plastic picnic blanket with a colorful pattern

eco_credentials.packaging: Wrapped with a recycled card stock band
eco_credentials.details: Helps reduce plastic waste and gives bottles a new life.

name: Natural Dish Soap Block
description: A concentrated, solid block of dish soap made from natural, plant-based ingredients. Free of palm oil, parabens, and sulfates. Lasts for months and eliminates plastic bottle waste.

images.alt: Block of natural dish soap on a wooden tray

eco_credentials.packaging: Unpackaged, with a small recycled paper tag
eco_credentials.details: Biodegradable formula safe for sensitive waterways.

name: Hemp and Recycled Cotton Hoodie
description: A comfortable and stylish hoodie made from a blend of organic hemp and recycled cotton. Naturally breathable and durable, with a soft, brushed fleece interior.

images.alt: Comfortable hoodie made from hemp and recycled cotton

eco_credentials.material: Organic hemp and recycled cotton blend
eco_credentials.details: Hemp cultivation requires minimal water and pesticides.

name: Stainless Steel Lunch Box
description: A durable, reusable lunch box made from food-grade stainless steel. Features a tiered design with a secure, leak-resistant clasp. A perfect plastic-free solution for packed lunches.

eco_credentials.packaging: Packaged in a recycled cardboard box
eco_credentials.details: Stainless steel is a highly durable and recyclable material.
